--- title: Matlab IO keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Reading mat files to python" ---

read_mat[source]

read_mat(filename:Union[str, Path])

A set of functions to convert .mat files from the PopDB to DataFrames

datetime_mtopy[source]

datetime_mtopy(datenum)

Input The fractional day count according to datenum datatype in matlab Output The date and time as a instance of type datetime in python Notes on day counting matlab: day one is 1 Jan 0000 python: day one is 1 Jan 0001 hence a reduction of 366 days, for year 0 AD was a leap year EX: df['date'] = df['tvec'].apply(lambda tvec: datetime_mtopy(tvec))

get_components[source]

get_components(mat)

helper function to process the mat file

dict2tuples[source]

dict2tuples(d)

helper to split comp names

make_datetime_index[source]

make_datetime_index(df)

creates a datetime index

mat2df[source]

mat2df(filename)

Popdb matlab .mat file to pandas df
